hero.title: Welcome to the Bharat Museum
hero.description: Experience cultures across the globe, from the dawn of human history to the present.

visit.title: Discover two million years of human history and culture

ageOfCuriosity.title: The Age of Curiosity
ageOfCuriosity.description: Explore the wonders of the natural world through the eyes of 17th-century collectors.

ancientEgypt.title: Ancient Egypt: Life and Death
ancientEgypt.description: Discover the civilization of ancient Egypt and their beliefs about the afterlife.

greekMyths.title: Greek Myths: Gods and Heroes
greekMyths.description: Journey through the legendary tales of ancient Greece and their lasting influence.

ancientIndia.title: Ancient India: Art and Architecture
ancientIndia.description: Explore the rich artistic and architectural traditions of ancient India over 5,000 years.

collectionHighlights.title: Collection Highlights
collectionHighlights.description: Explore some of the most significant objects from our collection spanning over two million years of human history and culture.

rosettaStone.title: Rosetta Stone
rosettaStone.description: The key to deciphering Egyptian hieroglyphs, dating to 196 BC.

parthenonSculptures.title: Parthenon Sculptures
parthenonSculptures.description: Classical Greek marble sculptures that adorned the Parthenon temple in Athens.

lewisChessmen.title: Lewis Chessmen
lewisChessmen.description: 12th-century chess pieces carved from walrus ivory, discovered on the Isle of Lewis.

suttonHooHelmet.title: Sutton Hoo Helmet
suttonHooHelmet.description: Anglo-Saxon helmet from the early 7th century, discovered in Suffolk, England.

ashokaPillar.title: Ashoka Pillar
ashokaPillar.description: Famous lion capital from the Ashoka Pillar, a symbol of modern India dating to the 3rd century BCE.

dancingShiva.title: Dancing Shiva
dancingShiva.description: Bronze Nataraja statue depicting the Hindu god Shiva as the cosmic dancer, from the Chola dynasty.

indusValleySeals.title: Indus Valley Seals
indusValleySeals.description: Ancient seals from the Indus Valley Civilization featuring early script and animal motifs, circa 2600-1900 BCE.

ajantaCavePaintings.title: Ajanta Cave Paintings
ajantaCavePaintings.description: Reproductions of the famous Buddhist cave paintings from Ajanta, showcasing ancient Indian art from the 2nd century BCE.
